thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 3 of 693
thread.title: JOHN PEARSON
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by JOHN PEARSON

author: JOHN PEARSON
title: JOHN PEARSON
text:
Excellent customer service, great clean car, reasonable price
The manager on duty was knowledgeable, courteous, and recommended various options clearly
Would use again . Better than some other car hire services I have used for both business and personal purposes.
